Defining Cut.name: Defining Cut
Defining Cut.flavor: Your deadly calm shapes the battle.
Defining Cut.attack: Wisdom vs. AC. If one of the targets is your oath of enmity target, both targets are treated as your oath of enmity target for this attack.
Defining Cut.onHit: 3[W] + Wisdom modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target takes 10 damage the first time it uses an attack other than a basic attack.

Deadly Calm.name: Deadly Calm
Deadly Calm.flavor: Without malice, without anger, each blow is delivered as smoothly and perfectly as a one-word prayer.
Deadly Calm.effect: Until the stance ends, when you make two attack rolls because of oath of enmity and both would hit, the target takes extra damage equal to one-half your level.

Heaven's Edge.name: Heaven's Edge
Heaven's Edge.flavor: Your strike wins the favor of your deity, which in turn guides your weapon against your sworn foe.
Heaven's Edge.onHit: 3[W] + Wisdom modifier damage. Before the end of the encounter, when you are next able to make two attack rolls because of your oath of enmity, you can instead make three attack rolls and use the result you prefer.
Heaven's Edge.special: If you have no encounter attack powers available when you use this power, it is reliable.
